refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: AccessibleImage_ref ()
refsect2.para: Increment the reference count for an AccessibleImage object.

listitem.simpara: a pointer to the AccessibleImage implementor on which to operate.

refsect2.title: AccessibleImage_unref ()
refsect2.para: Decrement the reference count for an AccessibleImage object.

listitem.simpara: a pointer to the AccessibleImage implementor on which to operate.

refsect2.title: AccessibleImage_getImageDescription ()
refsect2.para: Get the description of the image displayed in an AccessibleImage object.

listitem.simpara: a pointer to the AccessibleImage implementor on which to operate.
a UTF-8 string describing the image.

refsect2.title: AccessibleImage_getImageSize ()
refsect2.para: Get the size of the image displayed in a specified AccessibleImage object.

listitem.simpara: a pointer to the AccessibleImage to query.
a pointer to a long into which the x extents (width) will be returned.
a pointer to a long into which the y extents (height) will be returned.

refsect2.title: AccessibleImage_getImagePosition ()
refsect2.programlisting: void AccessibleImage_getImagePosition (AccessibleImage *obj, long int *x, long int *y, AccessibleCoordType ctype);
refsect2.para: Get the minimum x and y coordinates of the image displayed in a specified AccessibleImage implementor.

listitem.simpara: a pointer to the AccessibleImage implementor to query.
a pointer to a long into which the minimum x coordinate will be returned.
a pointer to a long into which the minimum y coordinate will be returned.
the desired coordinate system into which to return the results, (e.g. SPI_COORD_TYPE_WINDOW, SPI_COORD_TYPE_SCREEN).

refsect2.title: AccessibleImage_getImageExtents ()
refsect2.programlisting: void AccessibleImage_getImageExtents (AccessibleImage *obj, long int *x, long int *y, long int *width, long int *height, AccessibleCoordType ctype);
refsect2.para: Get the bounding box of the image displayed in a specified AccessibleImage implementor.

listitem.simpara: a pointer to the AccessibleImage implementor to query.
a pointer to a long into which the minimum x coordinate will be returned.
a pointer to a long into which the minimum y coordinate will be returned.
a pointer to a long into which the image x extent will be returned.
a pointer to a long into which the image y extent will be returned.
the desired coordinate system into which to return the results, (e.g. SPI_COORD_TYPE_WINDOW, SPI_COORD_TYPE_SCREEN).
